snippet: After Latisha Hopewell’s older daughter began asking questions about why she had left college, she knew it was time to pursue a degree.
abstract: Educational Alliance, a beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Latisha Hopewell of Lower Manhattan cover education costs for herself and her daughters.
lead_paragraph: After Latisha Hopewell’s older daughter began asking questions about why she had left college, she knew it was time to pursue a degree.

headline.print_headline: Going Back to College, and Teaching Her Daughters the Value of Education
headline.main: Going Back to College, and Teaching Her Daughters the Value of Education
